name: ManageBroke
description:
This game is made by Abhishek Pillai and Goncalo Lopes Madeira Lau with assistance from John Henry Harrison, Louis Amado and William.

The game is about the character Manageboy exploring the Managebac assesment policies and you control him through his journey

CONTROLS PLUS HOW TO PLAY:

  • Arrow Keys (Left and Right for moving and Up for jump)
  • Level 1 - Jump on the dropdown menu till it sets to a time before 8pm and then jump to the button (i. All summative assessments must be planned for MYP and DP the latest is on any given day before 20:00)
  • Level 2 - Jump through the right marks for the right criterions for the right subjects using Manageboy (ii. All summative grades are recorded in managebac)
  • Level 3 - Upload the (corrupted) file to managebac (v. Students must upload their relevant documents to managebac before the deadline, vi. Uploading corrupted files/empty files is not allowed )
  • SCORE: The lower it is the better, the current WR is 553 set by Abhishek Pillai (The score is the amount of frames you took so it is duration based)
